author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Implement read/write locks. As there's no native equivalent in OS/2
I've hacked up an implementation using a mutex/event semaphore pair. Not
heavily verified but passes a few tests I put it through.

author: rbb
msg: I accidentally commented out this function in my last commit.
This puts it back in, but it also makes a failure non-terminal.
Read/write locks were not implemented for the old API on Windows,
but they are using the new API, so this failure can't be
terminal, because if it is, the new API isn't tested.

author: rbb
msg: Implement read/write locks on Windows.  This passes the tests
in CVS, but I'm not 100% convinced they are correct.  Could people
with more Windows experience look these over.

author: rbb
msg: This allows us to generate a valid Makefile on Visual C++ 7.0.
This should work on versions of VC++ as well.

author: bnicholes
msg: Added the ability to extract the APR_FINFO_NAME data for NetWare
